Package com.oracle.coherence.spring

Class CoherenceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.coherence.spring.CoherenceContext
  • @Component
public class CoherenceContext
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to capture the ApplicationContext so that it is available to Coherence classes that are not managed by Spring.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Ryan Lubke
